ygData.subject: Re: Languages
ygData.msgSnippet: No, it doesn t work like that. I could train in Gnoll before ever seeing one, and I still cqn t train in Elvish or Barbarian though I have them both up to
ygData.messageBody:
No, it doesn't work like that.
I could train in Gnoll before ever seeing one, and I still cqn't train in
Elvish or Barbarian though I have them both up to excellent by now.

Ramagh, 14th level Erudite Wizard, Fenin Ro.

On Tue, 11 May 1999, Frank Varbel wrote:
> i think you can train in any language at your guild once you have been
> exposed to it. for example i bet you spent some time in blackburrow before
> you went and checked. and now you can train in gnoll.
